item.title: Abstracting the complexity of microgrids
item.description: It is not secret anymore, that the way we are using energy cause damage to our planet. In 2021 we expect to consume 40x energy compare to 1900. Â Due to the global warming we will demand 3x energy by 2050 compare today. To adjust to the new energy reality, organizations are under growing pressure to participate in the globalization effort reduce emission and avoid global warming. Over the past decades the cost of electricity distribution increased by 50% in the U.
